links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Paul Brooke''' is an English radio and television actor. His credits include the ''Dr. Who'' radio series and ''Bridget Jones' Diary'', but his most iconic role is that of the weeping, fat-bellied [http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Malakili Rancor guard] in the third ''Star Wars'' movie, ''The Return of the Jedi''. He voiced the part of [[Gríma|Gríma Wormtongue]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]] broadcasted on the BBC 4.
